parameters.name: creator
parameters.description: The ID of the user who creates the deployment.

parameters.name: executionMode
parameters.description:
The execution mode of the deployment.

Valid values:

*   BATCH
*   STREAMING

parameters.name: labelValueArray
parameters.description: The tag value. Separate multiple values with semicolon (;).

parameters.name: modifier
parameters.description: The ID of the user who modifies the deployment.

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: The page number. Minimum value: 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 100. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
The latest status of the deployment.

Valid values:

*   CANCELLED
*   FAILED
*   RUNNING
*   TRANSITIONING
*   FINISHED
